thread.title: SEO Brand Honored as Leading SEM Firm by Top SEOs
thread.title_full: SEO Brand Honored as Leading SEM Firm by Top SEOs - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: SEO Brand Honored as Leading SEM Firm by Top SEOs
text:
SEO Brand has grown from a boutique firm into a national marketing powerhouse, led by some of the brightest minds in digital marketing today.
Hollywood, FL -- ( ReleaseWire ) -- 09/22/2015 -- SEO Brand ( http://www.seobrand.com/ ) has been recently honored as the recipient of the 8th Best SEO Firm by Top SEOs (www.topseos.com). The prestigious mention was recently syndicated across major newswires by Top SEOs in a national press release intended to honor SEO Brand for its transparent efforts in the online marketing arena.
SEO Brand is a full-featured digital marketing firm with locations spread across North America.
The firm specializes in providing marketing that includes:
- SEO
- PPC Advertising
- Email Marketing
- Display Advertising
- Social Management
- Online PR
- Reputation Management
- Blogger Outreach
- Blogging Management
- Content Marketing
"I am honored and humbled to receive this astute recognition for SEO Brand by Top SEOs," said Michael Salvaggio, CEO of SEO Brand. "I created this marketing agency with the objective of helping expand our client's reach and customer base. Receiving this award helps solidify our strong focus on branding and marketing."
Over the past ten years, SEO Brand has grown from a boutique firm into a national marketing powerhouse, led by some of the brightest minds in digital gorilla marketing today. As the company has expanded its presence, it's had the pleasure of providing services to clients big and small, and for brand names that range from national to local.
"Our focus is succinct when we take on a new client," explained Christian Bauman, Project Manager of Brand Reputation and Social Media. "We don't look at clients like they are just another number here. Whether you are local cookie shop or a national brand, we'll be hitting the game hard to get you the rankings, saturation and attention that you deserve as our client."
Learn more by visiting: http://www.seobrand.com/
About Top SEOs
topseos.com is an organizer of online marketing information. The key ambition of topseos.com is to establish and declare those individuals or companies offering best online marketing solutions available. Search engine optimization companies are put through a rigorous examination to ensure the recommendations contain the absolute best companies the online marketing industry has to offer.
About SEO Brand
SEO Brand is an Interactive Marketing firm with over a decade's worth of business experience in Internet Marketing Services and program integration. Our award-winning team stands at the forefront of all emerging trends in digital marketing. When it comes to brand development, no business, no campaign is too small or too large to benefit from the brightening horizons of digital marketing.
